thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 4 of 137
thread.title: Ginny Hahn

author: Ginny Hahn
title: Ginny Hahn
text:
My daughter suggested DogVacay for me when I was stressing over having to board my dog for an out of town family event. The first person
I contacted wasn't a good fit for my playful pup, but the second person with huge yard, elderly live-in dog and relaxed & gentle demeanor was perfect. I highly recommend a meet & greet if you have a younger, athletic dog to make sure it's a good fit. It made all the difference for us. This was a great experience for both me and my new rescue. She now runs to the car, probably hoping I'll take her back to her 'pack.' üê∂
